trans-unit.source: Used to track relationships between objects in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 用來追蹤物件內容中物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: RelationshipManager is used to track relationships between objects in an object context.
trans-unit.target: RelationshipManager 用來追蹤物件內容中物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of the RelationshipManager class for each relationship tracked in the object context.
trans-unit.target: 沒有一個追蹤物件內容中的每個關聯的 RelationshipManager 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Relationships are defined by associations in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性定義概念模型中的關聯。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[關聯元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Create method is used by objects that implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Create 方法是由實作<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>物件

trans-unit.source: When Object Services requests the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> property of an object that implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>, the Create method is called if the relationship manager does not already exist for the object.
trans-unit.target: 當物件服務要求<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>實作的物件屬性<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>，如果關聯性管理員已經不存在的物件呼叫 Create 方法。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager>

trans-unit.source: Reference to the entity that is calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 正在呼叫這個方法的實體參考。

trans-unit.source: The requested <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要求<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of all the related ends managed by the relationship manager.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的關聯性管理員所管理的所有相關端的列舉。

trans-unit.source: The GetAllRelatedEnds method returns an enumeration of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: GetAllRelatedEnds 方法傳回的列舉<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>物件。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> are concrete types that derive from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>而<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>是衍生自<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>具象型別</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601></xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> abstract class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>抽象類別會實作<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>介面。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of objects that implement <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>實作的物件<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An empty enumeration is returned when the relationships have not yet been populated.
trans-unit.target: 當關聯性尚未擴展，則會傳回空的列舉。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns either an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> of the correct type for the specified target role in a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>關聯性中的指定的目標角色的正確類型。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used in scenarios where the user does not have full metadata, including the static type information for both ends of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會用於案例中，在使用者不具有完整的中繼資料，包括關聯性兩端的靜態類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This metadata is specified in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute> object on each entity type in the relationship, so the metadata system can retrieve it based on the supplied relationship name and target role name.
trans-unit.target: 此中繼資料中指定<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute>在關聯性，因此中繼資料系統可以擷取它的每個實體類型的物件會根據提供的關聯性名稱和目標角色名稱。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The relationship name should not be namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 此關聯性名稱不應該符合命名空間。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: 當您在前面加上此關聯性名稱的命名空間，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Name of the relationship in which `targetRoleName` is defined.
trans-unit.target: 在其中的關聯性名稱`targetRoleName`定義。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 此關聯性名稱不符合命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Target role to use to retrieve the other end of `relationshipName`.
trans-unit.target: 要用來擷取另一端之目標角色`relationshipName`。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd"></xref> representing the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> that was retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd"></xref>代表<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>已擷取。

trans-unit.source: relationshipName or targetRoleName is .
trans-unit.target: relationshipNameor targetRoleName is .

trans-unit.source: The source type does not match the type of the owner.
trans-unit.target: 來源類型不符擁有者型的別。

trans-unit.source: targetRoleName is invalid.
trans-unit.target: targetRoleName不正確。

trans-unit.source: -or- Unable to find the relationship type in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到中繼資料中的關聯性類型。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to deserialize entity objects along with the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 在內部用來還原序列化實體物件連同<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 序列化資料流。

trans-unit.source: Called by Object Services to prepare an <xref href="System.Data.EntityKey"></xref> for binary serialization with a serialized relationship.
trans-unit.target: 若要準備物件服務呼叫<xref href="System.Data.EntityKey"></xref>序列化關聯性的二進位序列化。

trans-unit.source: Serialization of relationships is only supported for binary serialization.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性的序列化僅支援二進位序列化。

trans-unit.source: Complete object graphs, including relationships, is not supported for Windows Communication Foundation and XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: Windows Communication Foundation 和 XML 序列化不支援完整的物件圖形，包括關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Serializing Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[序列化物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99)。

trans-unit.source: Describes the source and destination of a given serialized stream, and provides an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 描述給定序列化資料流目的地與來源，並提供其他呼叫端定義的內容。
